article.class: post-34 page type-page status-publish has-post-thumbnail entry

div.p: Welcome to Imagine! Your child will receive the most personal attention possible at our school. Our individualized focus … ...more

article.class: post-38 page type-page status-publish has-post-thumbnail entry

div.p:
Imagine Schools Standards-Based Curriculum
At Imagine Schools, we have developed a curriculum that guides teachers … ...more

article.class: post-964 page type-page status-publish has-post-thumbnail entry

div.p: Imagine Akron Kindergarten Academy is our sister academy. They focus entirely on kindergarten education and development. … ...more

article.class: post-91 page type-page status-publish has-post-thumbnail entry

div.p: Imagine Schools’ vision is for every student to reach his or her full potential and discover the pathways for life-long … ...more

p.br:
Front Office:330-753-1000
Attendance Line:
Office Fax:330-753-1005

Hours of Operation - click here
School Forms/Doc - click here
School Calendar - click here
Cafeteria Menus - click here
Faculty/Staff Contacts - click here
Employment - click here

img.br: As a family community school we will partner with all stakeholders to promote character and academic success by modeling and setting high expectations for students to S.O.A.R (Stay on task, Own up to mistakes, Always listen, Respect everyone)

p.br: As the Imagine Leadership Academy Family we will create an environment that allows students, staff and all stake holders to: L.E.A.D (Love Learning, Excel in all they do, Achieve goals together and Do what is Right)

footer.div:
Interested in working for us? Employment Opportunities Click here
Imagine Schools are committed to a policy of non-discrimination, to review our policy please click here
While every effort has been made to ensure the accuracy of the information supplied herein, Imagine Schools and it's agents cannot be held responsible for any errors or omissions.
